bibl.title: An account from the dossier of domus divina or the archive of Apions
bibl.seg: Marcin Kotyl, An account from the dossier of domus divina or the archive of Apions.
An edition of a Byzantine account from the Giessen collections (P.Giss. inv. 167), which presumably belongs to the dossier of domus divina or the archive of Apions. Oxyrhynchites, ca. VI CE.
bibl.note: An edition of a Byzantine account from the Giessen collections (P.Giss. inv. 167), which presumably belongs to the dossier of domus divina or the archive of Apions. Oxyrhynchites, ca. VI CE.
